notFoundMessage: Did you forget to add the page to the router?
pleaseFillBothPasswordFields: Please fill in both current and new password fields
onlyJpegPngAllowed: Only JPEG and PNG files are allowed.
eachFileLessThan2MB: Each file must be less than 2MB.
uploadLimitError: You can upload up to 5 photos only.
youMustBe18OrOlder: You must be 18 years or older
enableLocationPermission: Please enable location permissions in your browser or device.
geolocationNotSupported: Geolocation is not supported by your browser.
accountDeletedDescription: Your account has been successfully deleted
loginSuccessMessage: You've successfully logged in and verified your email.
option1Description: Log into your account, go to Profile settings, and click on "Delete Account".
option2Description: If you don't have access to your account, you can submit a deletion request.
whatGetsDeletedDescription: When you request data deletion, we will remove: your profile information, authentication data, and usage history.
deletionProcessNote: Note: The deletion process may take up to 30 days to complete.
contactUsDescription: If you have any questions about data deletion, please contact us at privacy@example.com
privacyPolicyIntroduction: This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.
howWeUseYourInformationDescription: We use your information to provide and maintain our service, improve user experience, and communicate with you.
communicateAboutAccount: Communicate with you about your account
dataProtectionDescription: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information.
updatesToPolicyDescription: We may update this privacy policy from time to time.
dataDeletionRequestDescription: We'll process your data deletion request within 30 days.
